name: part_007
file: tmp_【#冥ハロ2025】白上フブキ生誕３DLIVE「冥界Halloween Night!」【白上フブキ⧸ホロライブ】 [7Tm7dVsTPBk]_gemini-3-pro-preview/reencoded/part_007.mov

scenes.description: Shirakami Fubuki singing 'The Apple Seller's Bubble Girl' on a stage with castles.
A narrative animation sequence where Fubuki speaks to the audience, inviting them to the Underworld Halloween Party.
Fubuki in a gothic outfit performing 'Blue Flame' (Souen) in a dark, candlelit setting.

subtitles.original: そしていつか笑うように眠る
subtitles.english: And someday, I will sleep as if smiling,

subtitles.original: 何故なら二人は放たれているから
subtitles.english: Because the two of us have been set free.

subtitles.original: 死んだ世界で唯二人が幸せだった
subtitles.english: In a dead world, only the two of us were happy.

subtitles.original: さて、今日はこれくらいにしておきましょう。
subtitles.english: Now then, let's call it a day for now.

subtitles.original: そろそろ時間になりましたし。
subtitles.english: It is about time, after all.

subtitles.original: …え？どこへ向かうのかって？
subtitles.english: ...Eh? You ask where we are heading?

subtitles.original: 今日は何の日かご存知ないのですか？
subtitles.english: Do you not know what day it is today?

subtitles.original: 今日は、この王国の地下深くにある冥界でのハロウィンパーティーですよ！
subtitles.english: Today is the Halloween Party in the Underworld, deep beneath this kingdom!

subtitles.original: 死者と生者が楽しむ年に一度のお祭りです。
subtitles.english: It is a once-a-year festival where the dead and the living enjoy themselves together.

subtitles.original: さあ、一緒に向かいましょう。
subtitles.english: Come now, let us head there together.

subtitles.original: でも、気を付けて。
subtitles.english: But, be careful.

subtitles.original: パーティーとはいえ、死者が住まう冥界です、
subtitles.english: Even though it is a party, it is the Underworld where the dead reside,

subtitles.original: 誰かの思念や死者達によって奇妙な事が起こるかもしれません、
subtitles.english: Strange things might happen due to someone's lingering thoughts or the dead themselves,

subtitles.original: でも、決してそちらに耳を傾けすぎてはいけませんよ。
subtitles.english: But, you must never listen too closely to them.

subtitles.original: それでは、参りましょう
subtitles.english: Well then, let's go.

subtitles.original: 誰かが言いました
subtitles.english: Someone once said,

subtitles.original: 激しく燃えるものほど
subtitles.english: "The more violently something burns,"

subtitles.original: 煌めく引き換えに
subtitles.english: "In exchange for its sparkle,"

subtitles.original: その身をすぐ焦がしきると
subtitles.english: "It will scorch its body completely in an instant."

subtitles.original: 数ある燭台に
subtitles.english: On the many candlesticks,

subtitles.original: お好きな火を灯しましょう
subtitles.english: Let's light a fire of your choosing.

subtitles.original: 期待と裏腹に
subtitles.english: Contrary to expectations,

subtitles.original: 燻ればお生憎様
subtitles.english: If it smolders, that is a pity.

subtitles.original: ランランランラン
subtitles.english: Ran-ran-ran-ran,

subtitles.original: 右手には錆びた時計
subtitles.english: In the right hand, a rusted watch.

subtitles.original: ランランランラン
subtitles.english: Ran-ran-ran-ran,

subtitles.original: 左には油の筒
subtitles.english: In the left, an oil canister.

subtitles.original: ランランランラン
subtitles.english: Ran-ran-ran-ran,

subtitles.original: 絹のドレスを着飾って さあ
subtitles.english: Dress up in a silk dress, and come now.

subtitles.original: 激しく 儚く
subtitles.english: Violently, fleetingly...

subtitles.original: 蒼く燃ゆる花びら
subtitles.english: The blue burning petals.

subtitles.original: 瞬き ゆらめく
subtitles.english: Twinkling, flickering...

subtitles.original: 生を彩り照らせ
subtitles.english: Color and illuminate life.

subtitles.original: いずれ尽き果てる未来へと
subtitles.english: Towards a future that will eventually run out.

subtitles.original: ゆりかごの目の前で
subtitles.english: In front of the cradle,

subtitles.original: 遍く飛び交う銃弾
subtitles.english: Numerous bullets flying all around.

subtitles.original: 指だけ動かせば容易くその火は潰える
subtitles.english: If you just move a finger, that fire is easily extinguished.

subtitles.original: 仮初めの情熱で焼け爛れた舌では
subtitles.english: With a tongue burnt and festering from a transient passion,

subtitles.original: 上手に喋ることができないようで
subtitles.english: It seems you cannot speak skillfully.

subtitles.original: 喉元すぎても毒を孕ませて
subtitles.english: Even if it passes the throat, it is pregnant with poison,

subtitles.original: やがては肺を
subtitles.english: Eventually rotting the...
